main event: Large, irregular shaped objects with a change trail were observed in the sky, appearing to flash blue and red.
interesting points: The objects were seen drifting across the sky,The flash was very bright, resembling an explosion,The sighting lasted approximately 4 to 5 seconds,Witnesses included individuals from Denver, Colorado,The objects had an orange trailing effect.
sighted object: large irregular shaped objects with change trail
witness description: ages unknown, all from Denver, Colorado
